ocean.question: I'm big and blue and fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water
🚢 Boats sail on me
🌊 You can swim in me, but be careful!

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a type of animal
🏠 I carry my home on my back
🥬 Sometimes people eat me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I'm a sea creature
⚫ I can squirt ink
💪 I have lots of arms to hug with

ocean.question: I am a large fish with sharp teeth. Be careful!

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🦷 Some people think I am scary.

ocean.question: I'm a home for many fish and plants under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I'm made of rock and hard material
🐠 Fish like to live in me
🧱 I'm built by tiny animals over many years

ocean.question: I'm a big, friendly ocean animal that sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎶 I can make sounds under water.
🌊 I breathe air.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish with a pointy nose, what am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm brightly colored.
👃 My nose looks like a bird's beak.
🐡 I live in a coral reef.

ocean.question: I have a pouch for my babies and I swim upright. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look like a tiny horse.
🤰 Male carry the babies
🌱 I live in shallow waters

ocean.question: I sting if you get too close and float in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🪪 I do not have bones
⛱️ I am often see in the summer.
😖 My sting hurts.

ocean.question: I’m a master of disguise, blending in with my surroundings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a type of fish.
🍃 I can change my color.
👁️ I am very good at hiding

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow, and I shine so bright! I keep the Earth warm with my light. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You see me every day!
🔥 I am very hot!
💛 I am the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 This is where you live!
💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 I am a planet.

cosmos.question: I shine at night, and sometimes I look like a banana! What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I am in the sky at night!
🧀 People thought I was made of this!
🌛 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. What am I called?

hints.text: ✨ Look up at the night sky to see me!
🐻 Some of us look like bears.
🌌 I am made of many stars.

cosmos.question: I am a very hot ball of gas far, far away. I twinkle in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am much bigger than Earth!
🌟 I make my own light.
✨ The Sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a giant, swirling group of stars, dust, and gas. Our solar system lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am very, very big!
🥛 Mine is called the Milky Way!
🌌 I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a planet that is red and rusty. People sometimes call me the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People have sent rovers to explore me.
🔴 I am the fourth planet from the Sun.
🍫 I look like rust.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot, which is a giant storm! What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I am made mostly of gas.
🔴 That spot has been there for hundreds of years

cosmos.question: I am a rock or metal that flies through space. Sometimes I burn up when I enter Earth's atmosphere and become a shooting star. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can create craters on planets.
🌌 I am smaller than a planet.
🌠 People make wishes on me!

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that orbits the Sun. When I get close, I grow a bright tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of frozen gases.
☄️ I have a long, glowing tail when near the sun.
💫 I'm sometimes called a dirty snowball!
